message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
